result.arabic_text: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱرۡكَعُواْ وَٱسۡجُدُواْۤ وَٱعۡبُدُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ وَٱفۡعَلُواْ ٱلۡخَيۡرَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِحُونَ۩
result.translation: Emwe bemeye Imana Allah n’Intumwa yayo Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah)! Nimwuname munubame mu gihe muriko murasenga, mwongere mwiyegereze Imana yanyu Rurema Allah mu vyo mukora vyose munayisenge mutayibangikanya, muheze mukore n’ivyiza kugira muronke intsinzi kw’isi no mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa[15];
result.footnotes: [15] Iyo uriko urasoma, ugeze ku mpera y’iyi Aayah uca wubama.
